Package org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal

Class InternalJdbiBinder

java.lang.Object
org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal.InternalJdbiBinder
public final class InternalJdbiBinder extends Object
Exposes binders for all aspects of JDBI objects.

      public com.google.inject.binder.LinkedBindingBuilder<GuiceJdbiCustomizer> bindCustomizer()
      Creates a new binding for a GuiceJdbiCustomizer. All registered customizers are called on a newly created Jdbi object and allow further customization of all aspects of the Jdbi object.
